item.title: Prepping Yourself to Conceptify Algorithms
item.description: In this article, we explore what concepts are, where they are useful, and how they are different to things that exist in vanilla C++17.
item.author: cjdb.ns@gmail.com (Christopher Di Bella)

item.title: Transforming std::find into std::ranges::find
item.description: Today, we dive into what std::find does, and how we can leverage various concepts to cleanly express its requirements, as achieved in std::ranges::find
item.author: cjdb.ns@gmail.com (Christopher Di Bella)
